name: Lost (itch) (Houtarou Oreki)
description:
Lost is a point and click style adventure game.

You are a researcher wanting to research about the mysterious stone you found on earth which has disappeared! Will you be able to find it and complete the research ?

Find out in the game :)

recommended requirements for smooth experience-

Ms Powerpoint 2013 or higher

RAM - 4GB

minimum requirements -

Powerpoint version 2010(not tested ) / 2013(tested)

RAM-2GB
